step1.para: Install wheel chocks.
Remove front bumper assembly if required.
Open hood and remove engine splash shield.
Remove air cleaner housing with turbocharger inlet tube attached, include disconnect IAT sensor.
Remove charge air cooler outlet hose from turbocharger and cooler.
Remove turbocharger oil drain hose from block and turbocharger.
Remove turbocharger oil supply hose from oil cooler and turbocharger.
Disconnect exhaust pipe assembly (turbo outlet) from turbocharger.
Remove turbocharger assembly from exhaust manifold. Cap open ports.
Clean mating surfaces.
Install turbocharger assembly to exhaust manifold.
Connect exhaust pipe assembly (turbo outlet) to turbocharger.
Install turbocharger oil supply hose to oil cooler and turbocharger, include replace gasket/seal.
Install turbocharger oil drain hose to block and turbocharger, include replace gasket/seal.
Clean air cleaner housing of any debris.
Install charge air cooler outlet hose to turbocharger and cooler.
Install air cleaner housing with turbocharger inlet tube attached, include connect IAT sensor.
Install engine splash shield.
Close hood and install front bumper assembly if removed.
Remove wheel chocks.
